name: Oasis - Portrait of a Farmer
description:
Like the drop of greenery on a desert, farmers are like oasis.
They represent nature in the desert that is the rest of the world. 
They live with nature, they are the people who are the most connected to the earth and yet their voices are not heard. They are ignored and rejected.
They are the people who work in acres and not in hours.
The hands that feed and hearts that share.
We thank you.

Artwork dedicated to the unheard voices of farmers and people who work to feed us.
-aham

1536×2048
